menu.content:

- ANY BAND ACROSS THE COUNTRY CAN PARTICIPATE. 
- 2 VOCALIST, 3 GUITARIST AND MAXIMUM 7 MEMBERS
- TIME LIMIT – A TOTAL OF 20MINUTES ON STAGE

menu.title: Rules
menu.content:
(ALL PHOTOGRAPHS MUST BE CLICKED DURING UTKARSH’16 AND INSIDE CAMPUS) (THEME: SMILE CART)
1. MAGNIFICO (SNAP OF THE EVENT) 
2. THE PANORAMANIACS (BEST PANORAMA SHOT OF THE EVENT) 
3. ART OF DOCUMENTARY - 60 SEC DOCUMENTARIES ON EVENTS ALL AROUND THE CAMPUS. USING ANIMATIONS AND AUDIOS ALLOWED. 
4. SELFIE CHALLENGE (BEST SELFIE OF THE EVENT)
